name: Run to Run
description:
A 2D platformer where constant motion is rewarded.

WASD to move. Space to Jump. F to boost your movements.

Use boost to jump large gaps, smash rocks, push...things! With boost, you can do anything! But you can't just boost around all the time.

 You have a limited amount of boost power. The best way to refill the boost meter is by doing all the things you came here to do in the first place, move! Jump off platformers, climb up walls, run. As long as you are moving you are generating more boost power, and the more you move, the more power you generate. 

Built using Unity and the Corgi Engine.
